snippet.title: New Game Tutorial vs Trill | Dev Progress Update 25 | Mega Man RPG Prototype (v2k23)
snippet.description:
[Repost from Ageman20XX's Channel]

I've made a significant amount of progress since the last update and I wanted to show everyone the fruits of my labour.   This video showcases the the new intro sequence / tutorial that you go through when starting a new game where you face off against Trill for the first time.  It's still a work-in-progress as per usual, but I'm still happy with how it's shaping up.  Let me know what you think of the changes so far in the comments.  :)

-----

For Context: I'm working on a 2023 update to Mega Man RPG Prototype that will expand chapter one, add some much needed polish to certain parts of the game, and (my personal favourites) finally add some camera action to battles and sound effect to everything.  These videos showcase my progress on the development thus far, and I hope you enjoy what you see!  I've certain enjoyed programming it.  :P

If you'd like to play the Mega Man RPG Prototype in its current version (which may or may not have the updates depending on when you watch this) you can do so right now by clicking here:  
https://prototype.mmrpg-world.net/

#megaman #rpg #prototype #mmrpg #fangame
#browsergame #battlesimulator #turnbased
#robotmasters #specialweapons #collectibleitems
#friendlycommunity #massivescope #labouroflove
